title: Choices Subcollection Schema
description: Schema definition for the choices subcollection under questions/{questionId}/choices

isCorrect.description: Whether this choice is a correct answer

position.description: Order/position of this choice within the question

constraints: Each question must have between 2 and 10 choices
At least one choice must have isCorrect=true
For allowMultipleCorrect=false questions, exactly one choice should be correct
For allowMultipleCorrect=true questions, multiple choices can be correct
